procedures.name: Office Visit
procedures.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient.

procedures.name: Electrocardiogram (ECG)
procedures.description: Routine ECG with at least 12 leads.

procedures.name: CT Scan Head
procedures.description: Computed tomography, head or brain; without contrast material.

procedures.name: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP)
procedures.description: Blood test that measures 14 different substances.
